name: McMansion World Land!
description:
A Troika! micro-setting in PocketMod format.

  • Create your own McMansion
  • Home Stager background
  • 3 McMansion denizens
  • Plot hooks?

McMansion World Land! is inspired by Kate Wagner's McMansion Hell and the nice folks in the McMansion Hell Discord community.

Words and Art by tiikerikani.

McMansion World Land! is an independent production by tiikerikani and is not affiliated with the Melsonian Arts Council.

US Letter and text-only format will be uploaded soon!
